content: be reproduced reprinted sold or knit for sale page 3 shape gussets note right and left gusset set up row need to be worked before starting the charts for the instep because pattern carries over into the gusset 1 st so that the diagonal stitch pattern flows out of the ribbing the gusset section is written separately for the right sock and left sock right gusset pick up sts along selvedge edges of heel flap and rejoin for working in the round as follows set-up round 1 gusset k18 18 20 heel sts pick up and k15 16 18 sts along the first edge of heel flap see pattern notes k across instep sts pick up and k15 16 18 sts along the second edge of the heel flap k9 9 10 to center of heel 78 83 92 sts this is the new start of round rearrange sts or place marker as you prefer set-up round 2 gusset k to 3 sts before instep k2tog k1 start of instep k1 *p1 k2 repeat from from * to last 2 instep sts p1 k1 start of gusset k1 ssk k to end of round 2 sts decrease set-up round 3 gusset k to instep k28 31 34 k2tog k1 gusset st and move k1 back to instep ndl yo k to end of round set-up round 4 gusset k to 3 sts before instep k2tog k1 k1 *p1 k2 repeat from * to last 5 instep sts p1 k4 k1 ssk k to end of round 2 sts decrease gusset round 1 k to instep work right sock chart for your size beginning with row 13 7 1 k to end of round gusset round 2 k to 3 sts before instep k2tog k1 work next row right sock chart for your size k1 ssk k to end of round 2 sts decrease repeat gusset rnds 1-2 in pattern 6 6 7 more times 60 65 72 sts rem continue on to foot instructions for your size left gusset pick up sts along selvedge edges of heel flap and rejoin for working in the round as follows set-up round 1-2 gusset work right gusset set-up rnds 1-2 set up round 3 gusset k to 1 st before instep yo k1 and move k1 to instep ndl ssk k to end of round set up round 4 gusset k to 3 sts before instep k2tog k1 k4 p1 *k2 p1 repeat from * to last instep st k1 k1 ssk k to end of round 2 sts decrease gusset round 1 k to instep work left sock chart for your size beginning with row 13 7 1 k to end of round gusset round 2 k to 3 sts before instep k2tog k1 work next row of left sock chart for your size k1 ssk k to end of round 2 sts decrease repeat gusset rnds 1-2 in pattern 6 6 7 more times 60 65 72 sts rem continue on
